mapper.select: select count(1) as contNum from bas_package_items a where a.item_id = #{item_id} and ((a.length <= 0 or a.length is null) or (a.width <= 0 or a.width is null) or (a.high <= 0 or a.high is null) or (a.volume <= 0 or a.volume is null) or (a.package_meas <= 0 or a.package_meas is null))
select a.item_id,b.wh_id,b.owner_id,a.order_out_id,a.line_no from order_out_details a inner join order_out b on a.order_out_id = b.order_out_id where a.status in (10,15)

select min(a.status) as minStatus,a.order_out_id from order_out_details a
a.order_out_id in
#{item}
group by a.order_out_id
